description_text: hi do you charge for taxes and custom charges fees

conversations.body_text:
i am looking to buy some pedals of amazon and it says the seller is you and
it ships from you put would i need to pay custom charges when in the uk

On Sun, 29 Jun 2025, 15:37 Shannon McGrath, <shannonmcgrath9722@gmail.com>
wrote:

> hi do you charge for taxes and custom charges fees
>
Hi Shannon McGrath,    Orders to the UK are currently shipped from China, so import duties may apply.
